intro: Nintendo Switch™ Exclusive & High Quality Graphics! Experience a Middle Eastern battlefield in a sandstorm that unfolds in gritty realism across a vast open field!
description:
Experience the reality of war in the Middle East on an open battlefield! Stunning, high-quality graphics bring the harrowing realities of combat to life. Use the unique weapon specializations of four different characters to cooperate and enjoy strategic gameplay. Assume the role of an elite Special Forces operative and navigate the interference of international special forces and terrorist organizations to secure or destroy Akra's advanced technology in the Special Warfare mission. Unleash your full potential in the final battle to decide the future of mankind. Amidst the deafening gunfire and flying shrapnel, it is you who will emerge a hero!

・Immersive environments and ultra-high-definition graphics bring the battlefield to life, from sand to bricks!
・Realistic graphics deliver an exhilarating battlefield experience.
・Join the ranks of an elite special forces unit and complete the Special Warfare mission.
・Unparalleled Realism! Enjoy a truly immersive experience with 3D sound and 3D physics engines.
・Stunning visuals! Realistic graphics perfectly recreate the lighting and shadows of an intense battlefield.
・Strategic gameplay is possible through the unique characteristics of four roles: Assault, Engineer, Support and Recon.
・Prove your combat skills in Deathmatch mode, where you go head-to-head with your enemies!
・Gain the tactical advantage by capturing battle zones in Domination Mode!
・Plant bombs in designated locations and defend against enemies trying to defuse them in Search and Destroy mode!
・Maximize your gun control with precise aiming and tilting systems to achieve victory.
・Experience the thrill of victory through teamwork that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

The intense, sandstorm-swept battlefield of the Middle East is reborn in photo-realistic detail! Work with four elite characters and use their unique special weapons to strategically lead to victory. Experience the thrill of a realistic battlefield that will ignite the passion of military enthusiasts! Enjoy precise gun control in the midst of tension. The game features stunning, photorealistic graphics created with a variety of 3D effects and remarkable rendering techniques. Don't miss out on Special Warfare, the ultimate team-based single player FPS where you fight alongside your comrades!

Synopsis 
In the year 2042, the desert of the Middle East becomes the new battleground! As desertification and resource depletion continue due to global warming, the Middle East is transformed into a region where the interests of the world's major powers clash over resource scarcity and political instability. In the midst of this chaos, the legendary ancient city of 'Akra' suddenly appears.

This city, Akra, harbors vast resources and extraordinarily advanced technologies left behind by ancient civilizations, and its very existence ignites the ambitions of nations. Despite the outward appearance of diplomacy, the struggle for control of Akra becomes a fierce covert battle between elite special forces. The technology that this city possesses holds the potential to bring unprecedented benefits to mankind, as well as the danger of plunging the world into destruction and chaos. Who will claim this power? And will the outcome be one of hope or despair?

Now begins the mission of Special Warfare! You will join an elite Special Forces unit and plunge into a battle of life and death. You must navigate the interference of international special forces and terrorist organizations, and face the ultimate decision of whether to secure or destroy Akra's technology. In the final battle, you will use all your skills to make a crucial decision that will shape the future of mankind.
